Delegate LiteralSniffer

Finds all literals in source, using token_table, and sets the reserved System.Collections.BitArray's indices to true that are the System.Char indices contained in the literals found within source.

Namespace: Polite
Assembly: Polite.dll
Syntax
public delegate Token[] LiteralSniffer(string source, TokenTable token_table, ref BitArray reserved);
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.String source

The source code wherein to extract literals from.
TokenTable token_table

The TokenTable to use as reference for pre-created Tokens that represent the literals' Token.Types
System.Collections.BitArray reserved

The System.Collections.BitArray that must have its indices set to true for all corresponding indices that make up the extracted literals within source.
Returns
Type Description
Token[]

All extracted Token literals.

Extensions.TryGetPropertyValue(Object, String, out Object)
Extensions.GetFieldValue(Object, String)
Extensions.TryGetFieldValue(Object, String, out Object)
